newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania refrigerator maker rejoins trading.
newsitem.headline: Romania refrigerator maker rejoins trading.

text.p: The Bucharest bourse said first-tier refrigerator maker Arctic would resume trading on Friday at its own request, a bourse statement showed.
Arctic sought suspension in June as its majority stockholder, the State Ownership Fund (FPS), was negotiating the sale of its stake.
The Fund said then it would start negotiations on the sale of its stake with a foreign company. But no sale has been concluded.

The FPS, which has a controlling stake in most Romanian state-run enterprises, holds 50.99 percent of Arctic. The company has a share capital of around 57.2 billion lei, in shares with a nominal value of 1,000 lei each.
